thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: David Semperger
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by David Semperger

author: David Semperger
title: David Semperger
text: I'm only a recent addition to the users of Bundle Stars, but my first experiences are positive all around. The site is easy to navigate, with a simple but effective design that has no fluff, just the way I like it. There's a large selection of games available as well and the registration and checkout process is quick as well. I don't know what more could I ask from a great store. :)
